status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"depil","text":"To purify the mCherry-tagged or GFP-tagged ATG13/101 subcomplex, we express mCherry-tagged ATG13 from a pCAG backbone (available from Addgene) together with GST-TEV-ATG101 (available from Addgene) or GST-TEV-GFP-tagged ATG13 from a pCAG backbone (available from Addgene) together with ATG101 (available from Addgene). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9l5pp","text":"Express the ATG13/101 subcomplex in FreeStyle™ HEK293F cells, grow at   in FreeStyle™ 293 Expression Medium (Thermo, 12338-026). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9glis","text":"The day before transfection, seed the cells at a density of 0.7 x 10^6 cells per ml. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fm2tv","text":"On the day of transfection, transfect a   culture with   of plasmid at a molar 1:1 ratio, dilute in   of Opti-MEMR I Reduced Serum Medium (Thermo, 31985-062), and   Polyethylenimine (PEI 25K, Polysciences CatNo 23966-1), also dilute in   of Opti-MEM media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":55,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":100,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":163,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":236,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"13","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"13","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"afeom","text":"One day post transfection, supplement the culture with   EXCELL R 293 Serum-Free Medium (Sigma-Aldrich, 14571C- 1000ML). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ki35","text":"Incubate the beads   with TEV protease in wash buffer at  , to release mCherry- or GFP-tagged ATG13/101 from the beads. {"blocks":[{"key":"1g4fj","text":"To collect the supernatant, collect the beads by centrifugation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eejqm","text":"Pool the supernatant fractions, filter through a 0.45 µm syringe filter, concentrate with 10 kDa cut-off Amicon filter (Merck Millipore), and load onto a pre-equilibrated Superose S6 Increase 10/300 GL column (Cytiva). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"caalm","text":"Elute the proteins with SEC buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fgm5h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7a2h3","text":"SEC buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ci8ep","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lpa6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"97n60","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bg6nl","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":""},"colTitles":["A","B"],"colWidths":[176,100],"data":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.4","50 mM"],["NaCl","200 mM"],["MgCl2","1 mM"],["DTT","1 mM"]],"guid":"94FADAA155D14987A5CF1CE813BB3FE0","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.4","50 mM"],["NaCl","200 mM"],["MgCl2","1 mM"],["DTT","1 mM"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93h56","text":"Analyze the fractions by SDS-PAGE and Coomassie staining. Pool the fractions containing both ATG13/101. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3cjsi","text":"After concentrating the purified protein, aliquote the protein and snap-frozen in liquid nitrogen. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gt26","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o2gj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fsutm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
